item.title: AWS CodeBuild - Create Your Windows DockerImage
item.description: If you want to build .Net with AWS CodeBuild Windows Server, or some C# Framework, sometimes you will encounter problems with native compilation that cannot be compiled properly. You should create your own Docker Image. Instructions Environment: Use a host or virtual machine or a direct EC2 (Windows Sever 2016 with Containers). At least 60GB of space is recommended for t2. Medium or higher. The build image will be better. The following is directly through EC2.
